info.title: Sportradar Tennis API
info.description: Sportradar Tennis API integration for competitions, tournaments, matches, and player data

name.description: Name of the category (e.g., ATP, WTA, Challenger)

generated_at.description: Timestamp when the data was generated
Timestamp when the data was generated
Timestamp when the data was generated

weight.description: Weight of the competitor in kg

height.description: Height of the competitor in cm

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the competitor

highest_singles_ranking_date.description: Date when highest singles ranking was achieved

highest_doubles_ranking_date.description: Date when highest doubles ranking was achieved

movement.description: Movement in ranking since last update

name.description: Name of the ranking system (e.g., WTA, ATP)

race_ranking.description: Whether this is a race ranking

generated_at.description: Timestamp when the data was generated
Timestamp when the data was generated

prize_money.description: Total prize money for the season

phase.description: Phase of the stage (e.g., qualification, stage_1_playoff)

generated_at.description: Timestamp when the data was generated
Timestamp when the data was generated

get.description: Retrieve all tennis competitions including ATP, WTA, and other tournaments
Retrieve detailed information about a specific tennis competition including children competitions

parameters.name: competition_id
parameters.description: The ID of the competition (e.g., sr:competition:2553)

get.description: Retrieve all seasons for a specific tennis competition

parameters.name: competition_id
parameters.description: The ID of the competition (e.g., sr:competition:2555)

get.description: Retrieve detailed profile information for a specific tennis competitor including rankings, statistics, and career information

parameters.name: competitor_id
parameters.description: The ID of the competitor (e.g., sr:competitor:157754)

get.description: Retrieve all competitors participating in a specific tennis season

parameters.name: season_id
parameters.description: The ID of the season (e.g., sr:season:107797)

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific tennis season including stages, competitors, and tournament details

parameters.name: season_id
parameters.description: The ID of the season (e.g., sr:season:107797)

info.complex: All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club

get.description: Retrieve all match summaries for a specific tennis season including results, scores, and match details

parameters.name: season_id
parameters.description: The ID of the season (e.g., sr:season:107797)

get.description: Retrieve detailed summary information for a specific tennis sport event including match results, scores, and event details

parameters.name: sport_event_id
parameters.description: The ID of the sport event (e.g., sr:sport_event:51041587)
